descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Buddy Hield hauls in the dish from Tyrese Haliburton and drills the 3-pointer to extend the Pacers' lead.
videos.headline: Tyrese Haliburton finds a wide-open Buddy Hield for 3

videos.description: It's showtime in Indiana as Isaiah Jackson elevates for the block which leads to Tyrese Haliburton's dime to Buddy Heild for the bucket.
videos.headline: The Pacers go on a 10-0 run after Isaiah Jackson's massive block

videos.description: Lance Stephenson drives past his defender and knocks down the and-1 for the Pacers.
videos.headline: Lance Stephenson drives and somehow gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Oshae Brissett activates his jetpack as he flys to the basket for the massive jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Oshae Brissett gets up for the beautiful slam) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Oshae Brissett soars through the paint and throws down the hammer

videos.description: Isaiah Jackson won't be denied as he snags the offensive board and knocks down the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Jackson hits the basket vs. Oklahoma City Thunder) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Jackson's second effort pays off for a Pacers and-1

videos.description: Tyrese Haliburton with the absolute dime to Isaiah Jackson for the and-1 to pull the Pacers within six.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Jackson somehow gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Jackson is smooth as silk with this up-and-under and-1

videos.description: Tre Mann crosses his defender and drains the floater to extend the Thunder's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tre Mann knocks down basket) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tre Mann nearly sends his defender flying with this filthy cross for the bucket

videos.description: Malcolm Brogdon hauls in the dime from Buddy Hield and buries the corner 3-pointer to extend the Pacers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Buddy Hield shows off his vision with nice dime vs. Oklahoma City Thunder) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Buddy Hield with the absolute dime to Malcolm Brogdon for 3

videos.description: Shai Gilegous-Alexander muscles through the paint and knocks down the and-1 to seal the victory for the Thunder on the road.
videos.headline: SGA won't be denied as he drains the and-1 to seal the victory
